1. How easy or hard is it to get chats from my HubSpot account to my website for further processing?

Hi Everyone, I'm using VS code but I'm having a bit of an issue with the command to upload (either that or I've done another step wrong)

On the command-line I'm trying the following "*npx hs upload test-theme test-theme"* to upload my theme to the web files on HubSpot.  It uploads, however it has been uploaded to "design tools" rather than "web files".   How do I make it upload to the web files?
